items.title: New research challenges belief that taurine supplements support longevity
items.description: A new study has found that taurine levels were not consistently associated with health outcomes.

items.title: Trump’s memo activating the National Guard doesn’t specify L.A. It could apply anywhere and preemptively, legal expert says
items.description: “No president has ever federalized the National Guard for purposes of responding to potential future civil unrest anywhere in the country.”

items.title: Bitcoin surges to $108,000 as top US and Chinese officials meet to discuss tariffs
items.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent will meet with top Chinese officials in London this week.

items.title: BowFlex weights item sold at Best Buy, Amazon, and more recalled after more than 100 injuries reported
Halloween decorations are already on sale—and it might be smart to buy now
